version_description:
Improved controls.
Various bug fixes and performance improvements.

Table Physics Improved! Easier than ever to pocket balls and run the table.
Performance improvements.

Plan your perfect shot with new ball impact and rebound lines!
Massive control enhancements to help nail those tough shots
New pool tables with faster felt for more action
Improved English for the sharp shooters
Win even more cash now!

BIG performance enhancements - no more pesky lag for some devices during cash matches
Realistic Lighting - those balls gleam!
Better Ball Physics - more heft, more realism, better ball spin!
Trick Shots are here! Show off your skills, score more points and take home a bigger payday!

New tournament modes with more ways to win BIG!
Performance improvements, gameplay enhancements and bug fixes.

This time around we bring you Skillz related upgrades!

• Completely revamped checkout flow
• Improved stability
• Tons of exciting new features, how many can you find?
We've overhauled the look, squished bugs, and fixed connection issues. Enjoy!
We've overhauled the look, squished bugs and fixed connection issues. Enjoy!

Just in time for the Holidays, we've got your online head-to-head games for cash, PayPal, and Apple Pay covered. Here's what we did this time:

Improved gameplay in head-to-head online matches.
Overhaul on visual polish and effects relating to pockets, trick-shots and turn announcements.
A variety of bug fixes.

Massive performance enhancements for smoother play and visual improvements to cues, pocketing and trick shots await in this update. There's never been a better time to take your skills to the tables and take home a stack of cash. Enjoy!

Massive performance enhancements for smoother play and visual improvements to cues, pocketing and trick shots await in this update. There's never been a better time to take your skills to the tables and take home a stack of cash. Enjoy!
Major upgrades to communications! We took a look at chat and improved things. A LOT. You can now send your favorite emoji's to the competition. Enjoy!

In this update we've improved physics and ball spin allowing for even fancier trick shots. We also took a look at controls and enhanced them in subtle but powerful ways. Finally, we made performance improvements and bug fixes to bring you the best pool game for winning cash.
You spoke, we listened! This build addresses physics feedback from our players, specifically the speed of the table, bank shots, and ball spin applied to the cue ball. Enjoy!

New game modes! This version introduces three all new ways to play; Rounds, Open Table, and Trick Mode. Of course it also includes optimizations and bug fixes.

Keep your eyes peeled for limited time tournaments featuring these exciting new ways to play.

For new players, we've overhauled and improved the first time user experience.

Additionally, this build includes general bug fixes and improvements.
